title: Unblock Music DB schema validation (Notion access required)
objective: Restore Notion access so Music Tracks / Music Artists schema validation and relation integrity checks can be performed for the 4-agent chain.
preflight: Provide NOTION_TOKEN/NOTION_API_KEY and confirm Notion network egress is permitted for this run.
Verify target DBs exist and are shared to the integration: Music Tracks (27ce73616c2780fbb40efefdd47d6640), Music Artists (20ee73616c27816d9817d4348f6de07c), discover Music Playlists if present.
Ensure notion-client available in environment (already present); re-run validation script once credentials are set.
steps: Inject valid Notion credentials and allow outbound access to Notion; confirm `_get_notion_client()` returns a client.
Query Music Tracks / Music Artists schemas: enumerate properties, types, and relations; identify missing or mismatched fields vs required checklist; discover Music Playlists DB if exists.
Document findings in the schema validation report and return handoff; update any required properties/relations and re-validate.
success_criteria: Notion access restored and DBs reachable with integration sharing confirmed.
Schema validation completed with properties/relations aligned to checklist (Title, URLs/IDs, Downloaded, File Path, Duration, BPM, Key, Artist/Tracks relations, etc.).
Report and return handoff delivered with resolved blockers or remaining gaps clearly listed.
